name: Hunting Evil
description:
A Action RPG old found Retro Unofficial Dark Pack Hunter Cartridge game,

Hunting down a serial killer to an abandoned mall to get revenge for your best 

friends murder.  

Controls:

WASD - to walk around 

Mouse click - Interact/Skip Dialogue/ Fire gun

E - to pickup items

Tips -

Enemies hit by colliders so do not get too close

Try not to click your mouse down incase you want to read all the dialogue the characters have to say 

All the art and programming was done by me! But the beautiful music track was done by my wonderful girlfriend

I hope you guys have fun with my Retro Action RPG for HUNTER and VTM.
